physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features military personnel in the interior of a building. They are dressed in different military uniforms. The left side of the photograph features military personnel seated in a single row, behind a long table that has several documents on it. The right hand side of the photograph features two rows of military personnel who are standing up. To their right are more seated personnel.
title_text: Japanese filing out after the signing the surrender Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography World War, 1939 - 1945 Japan. Rikugun Great Britain, Army Capitulations, Military
